The QA Systems & Regulatory Affairs Intern will support the QA Systems and Regulatory Affairs teams with setup and ongoing management of the supplier approval program. The intern will assist with document management within our supplier database and ensure compliance. The intern will also communicate with suppliers surrounding any questions or issues that may arise. The Internship Program will begin on May 11th and end August 14th, 2026. HOW YOU WILL MAKE CONTRIBUTIONS THAT MATTER... • Review and approve supplier documents, enter new items and information, answer supplier questions or concerns while utilizing our supplier management database (TraceGains); • Help with finalizing finished product recipes for BRC review with the help of the manufacturing plants; • Edit and update any necessary documents in compliance with QA requirements.
